title: [Bug]: "Copy Link" does not work anymore (denied)
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

The "Copy Link"  option in the context menu does not work anymore.

### What package are you using?

AppImage

### Version

Pre-releases 1.12.8, 1.13.0

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Right-click a link in a chat
2. Select "Copy Link"
3. => Link is not in clipboard

This is on Wayland.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Link is in clipboard and can be pasted somewhere.
```

### Debug

```markdown
I see this in the log.


16:28:57.848 › setPermissionRequestHandler clipboard-sanitized-write requested by https://teams.microsoft.com/v2/
16:28:57.848 › DENIED setPermissionRequestHandler clipboard-sanitized-write requested by https://teams.microsoft.com/v2/
```

### Additional context

_No response_
